name: rotational (Puzzle Bites Collection)
description:
rotational is a puzzle game where you rotate tiled parts of the level and on every level a box needs to be moved to a goal.  switch between two states while you try to solve each level. 

in play state the green agent can be moved by clicking to a destination.

in solve state the tiled parts of the level can be rotated.

all levels are handcrafted due to the nature of the mechanics. 100% all are solvable

----------------

CONTROLS

left mouse button only

----------------
